targets.query:
from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldDay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldTotal")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.YieldDay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0* ${kwhPrice}}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.sunrise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.sunset")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "iobroker")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC" or r["_measurement"] == "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.clouds")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openweathermap.0.forecast.current.clouds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "iobroker")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt.0.${ahoyTopic}.total.P_AC" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power" or r["_measurement"] == "shelly.0.SHPLG-S#123456#1.Relay0.Power")
